name: search.messages
desc: Searches for messages matching a query.

cursor.desc: Use this when getting results with cursormark pagination. For first call send `*` for subsequent calls, send the value of `next_cursor` returned in the previous call's results.

highlight.desc: Pass a value of `true` to enable query highlight markers (see below).

sort.desc: Return matches sorted by either `score` or `timestamp`.

sort_dir.desc: Change sort direction to ascending (`asc`) or descending (`desc`).

team_id.desc: encoded team id to search in, required if org token is used.
